biotools.summary: Performs structural similarity searches for small molecules, parts of proteins (i.e. binding sites) or whole proteins, with a preference towards 3D structure based methods. Users are assisted in selection of algorithms and databases that best suit their needs.

bioschemas.name: Superimpose
bioschemas.summary: Performs structural similarity searches for small molecules, parts of proteins (i.e. binding sites) or whole proteins, with a preference towards 3D structure based methods. Users are assisted in selection of algorithms and databases that best suit their needs.
